Uses of Class
com.aevi.payment.FinancialRequest

  • Packages that use FinancialRequest 
    Package Description
    com.aevi.payment
    This package provides classes for integrating payment functionality in third-party applications.

    • Uses of FinancialRequest in com.aevi.payment

      Subclasses of FinancialRequest in com.aevi.payment 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DepositRequest
      The DepositRequest object represents a single deposit request made to the Aevi payment application.
      class  MoToPaymentRequest
      A MoToPaymentRequest can be used to set up a credit card transaction without the card holder present.
      class  MoToRefundRequest
      A MoToPaymentRequest can be used to set up a credit card refund without the card holder present.
      class  PaymentRequest
      The PaymentRequest object represents a single payment request made to the Aevi payment application.
      class  PreAuthorisationRequest
      The PreAuthorisationRequest object represents payment reservation request made to the Aevi payment application.
      class  RefundRequest
      A RefundRequest can be used to set up a refund transaction with the payment application.
      class  TokenRequest
      The TokenRequest object represents a token request made to the Aevi payment application.
      Methods in com.aevi.payment that return FinancialRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FinancialRequest FinancialRequest.setAcceptedAccountTypes(AccountType... accountTypes)
      Restricts the types of Account that will be accepted by the App for the Financial Request.
      FinancialRequest FinancialRequest.setAcceptedCardEntryTypes(CardEntryType... cardEntryTypes)
      Restricts the acceptable methods by which card details can be captured for the Financial Request.
      FinancialRequest FinancialRequest.setAcceptedCardTypes(CardType... cardTypes)
      Restricts the types of card that will be accepted by the App for the Financial Request.
      FinancialRequest FinancialRequest.setAmount(java.math.BigDecimal amount)
      Sets the amount of the transaction.
      FinancialRequest FinancialRequest.setCurrency(java.util.Currency currency)
      Sets the currency for the request.
      FinancialRequest FinancialRequest.setExtraReference(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Adds an extra reference code for the transaction.
      FinancialRequest FinancialRequest.setMerchantId(java.lang.String merchantId)
      Sets the merchant with whom to process the transaction.
